articles.title: Strong demand pushes Arm to close IPO order book early - Financial Times
articles.description: Pricing could land towards the top end of the initial range of $47-$51 a share
articles.content:
The banks underwriting Arms $50bn listing will close orders for shares a day earlier than planned due to strong demand for the biggest initial public offering in nearly two years.
